name: ShapeSwitch
description:
thanks for vesiting

You can try out the game on: Android, ...?!

How to play?

On mobile : Tap the screen to change your shape.
On desktop/web : Click on the screen to change your shape.(not available yet!!!!!!)

Your goal is to get as many obstacles as you can by forming a shape which is identical to the obstacle' s shape. However, if it can' t fit in, you lose.

Features:
-One complete, endless level
-Increasing gameplay difficulty
-Score/highscore system
-Shape changing system
-Sound effects, background music

-Basic menu

-Responsive UI
-Compatible with mobile and desktop(not yet)

Credits: Background music by Eric Matyas: http://www.soundimage.org 

Sound effects: https://www.noiseforfun.com
